item.title: The Private Session - Musicals Vol.1
item.description:
The Private Session - Musicals Vol.1

The Piano is played by Dominik Franke, a brilliant pianist and musical director who is working on many class A theatre productions.

item.title: Brigitte Oelke
item.description:
Brigitte Oelke

Brigitte Oelke's affection for music started very early in her life. Her mother was the leader of the children's choir at the St. Gallen Stadttheater, in which Brigitte took part herself. Furthermore, she learnt to play multiple instruments but nevertheless, singing was her greatest passion. A friend of the family, Prof.

item.title: The Private Session - Brigitte Oelke & DMJ - Daybreak (Barry Manilow)
item.description:
The Private Session - Brigitte Oelke & DMJ - Daybreak (Barry Manilow)

With »The Private Session LIVE« I am sharing a lot of interesting and funny stories that happened on- and offstage and like to get in response with the audience. Every performance becomes a unique experience and we are having a lot of fun together.

item.title: Video-Teaser «The Private Session - Musicals Vol. 1»
item.description:
Video-Teaser «The Private Session - Musicals Vol. 1»

Watch the german promo video and be satisfied by my new album The Private Session – Musicals Vol.1

item.title: Brigitte Oelke's new path on the web
item.description:
Brigitte Oelke's new path on the web

I am excited to participate the future of the internet by being a Founding Member on THE GRID. While this stunning new service is in the tryout, I will start using it to let you participate on my activities. I really look forward to create an exciting place for you to find out more about my work and life as an artist. ALOHA! Brigitte Oelke

item.title: THE ONE
item.description:
THE ONE

An underground party rouses a revue theatre that has stood empty for decades from a deep sleep. A young guest loses himself in the extraordinary aura of this stunning setting. The former theatre director rekindles the splendour and glamour of times past in his mind’s eye. Past and present blur in a euphoric waking dream. While everything dissolves, floats and spins in front of him – and even the floor disappears from beneath him – he senses the support that he seeks: the person that means everything to him. THE ONE.

item.title: The Private Session
item.description:
The Private Session

In 2010 we were founding our own little music label called StagePeople. The first release was in 2011 with the debut of »The Private Session«. The idea behind this album was to professionally minimalize some of the most beautiful pop- and rocksongs and purely present them only with vocals, guitar and piano.

item.title: Brigitte Oelke «Discover Me !»
item.description:
Brigitte Oelke «Discover Me !»

Mr. Rock'n'Rohles is one of the rare Queen-Experts, if it comes to the music, that the master himself, Mr. May, is listening to. Therefore Frank Rohles created a killer-cover-version of Queen's «Don't Stop Me Now» which we perform on my EP - Discover Me !A must-have for every Queen-Fan ... and guess what ... Brian and Roger like it!

item.title: Killer Queen for more than a decade
item.description:
Killer Queen for more than a decade

I was having a great time in Vienna in 2015, playing the Killer Queen in WE WILL ROCK YOU

item.title: Sunset Boulevard
item.description:
Sunset Boulevard

On Sunday 17th, January 2016 I am transforming into Norma Desmond, performing the final show of Andrew Lloyd Webber's Sunset Boulevard at the Theater Bielefeld, Germany.
